00206 inline ShaderSource ParseShaders(const std::string& filePath)
00207 {
00208         std::ifstream stream(filePath);
00209 
00210         enum class ShaderType
00211         {
00212                 NONE = -1, VERTEX = 0, FRAGMENT = 1
00213         };
00214 
00215         std::string line;
00216         std::stringstream ss[2]; // stack allocated array that will store vertex and fragment strings
00217         ShaderType type = ShaderType::NONE; // set to none (-1) by default
00218         while (getline(stream, line))
00219         {
00220                 if (line.find("#shader") != std::string::npos)
00221                 {
00222                         if (line.find("vertex") != std::string::npos)
00223                                 type = ShaderType::VERTEX;
00224                         else if (line.find("fragment") != std::string::npos)
00225                                 type = ShaderType::FRAGMENT;
00226                 }
00227                 else
00228                 {
00229                         ss[(int)type] << line << '\n';
00230                 }
00231         }
00232 
00233         return{ ss[0].str(), ss[1].str() };
00234 }
